mechanics.condition: Creature within 15-foot cone AND Dexterity Saving Throw Failed
Creature within 15-foot cone AND Dexterity Saving Throw Succeeded
mechanics.outcome: Target takes half of 3d6 Fire Damage

mechanics.condition: Flammable object within 15-foot cone AND object is NOT worn or carried

description_text: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
